snippet.title: Aion - Ascension Trailer
snippet.description: Aion is a massively multiplayer online role-playing game (MMORPG) released by NCsoft, a major Korean game developer. The game combines PvP and PvE (a concept the developers call PvPvE) in a fantasy game environment. As of May 20, 2009, Aion has 3.5 million subscribers in Asia.[5] AION's first major expansion was released to North America and Europe on September 7, 2010 under the name AION: Assault on Balaurea.
